name: IIPLA Virtual IP Summit 2020
content: International Intellectual Property law Association is a non-profit organization which is formed in 2015 with a mission to promote IP development and to discuss the issues and challenges faced by the IP peers. Thus, to find the solution different editions of intellectual property conference and IPR event is organized in USA, Europe and UAE. Due to overwhelming concerns about COVID-19 and careful consultation with our team members regarding the health and safety of everyone, IIPLA is going to organization Virtual IP Summit 2020 from October 19-23, 2020\. With this Virtual IP Summit 20202 will focus on the number of evolving IP issue which are covered in Virtual intellectual property conference which shape the IP industry with the different series of IP Conference . This type of IP Conference gives opportunities for one on one meeting, Branding, Exhibition, promotion at large scale. More than 2000 IP professionals from different law Firms and organization across the world gather at Virtual Platform to discuss IP Services, to showcase their products and solutions to their IP Challenges in the Virtual IP Conference.
